fields.summary: Prevent Working Copy creation until acknowledgement has been received from the homework apps
fields.description:
h3. As a production, editor or superadmin user, I want to prevent working copy creation til all apps have acknowledged it's ability to commit the (last) working copy changes in their app so that I know that the HW apps are in sync with the Master.

Steps to get into this situation: 
1. Create a working copy
2. Make changes
3. If changes are made in a homework app, the app is notified via lifecycle events of each change. 
4. Commit working copy to master and send notification to commit working copy changes to homework app
5. MT should NOT wait to receive an acknowledgement from the homework app before proceeding to commit working copy changes on MT side.  
BUT 
6. (MT will prevent Snapshot creation-part of NG-12425), a new WC creation and (Push to Snapshot,part of NG-12426) till the acks are received or an admin override is performed.   
 
Creating a snapshot while in this state will result in the snapshot being created without the working copy changes in the homework app and we can't allow another WC to be created until the ACK is received from the original commit

*Acceptance criteria*
* If working copy commit notification to homework app has a status of In Progress:
** allow the commit WC changes on MindTap side but prevent a new WC from being created until the ACK has been received by MT. 

* edit and Push to snapshot icons will also be disabled when the ACK's from HW apps are in the pending state
* Banner message on the MT will display: 
This Master MindTap is waiting for acknowledgements from one or more HW apps. You cannot create a Snapshot or Working Copy or perform a Push to Snapshots.

* edit (pencil) will still display for all users when in this state 
** testing note: only the regular lock will disable the edit icon

* will unlock automatically when the ACK is returned successfully
(if a user locks WC creation manually, the lock will not be removed- this may be an AC for NG-12426 - need to verify)

*Testing Note*
* there could be HW from more than one app in a MT.  Need to check additions/deletions of HW Activities in a WC for all HW Apps, and combos of them

10/22/12 notes
-Modify the story to allow the commit to complete but do not allow WC/Snapshot to be created from the Master.
-  HW Apps will continue to queue the incoming messages and will sent the ACK back as it is processed. the HW apps have a timeout of 6 hours if the commit was unsuccessful

comments.body: If UI somehow let user submit a request to create working copy when acknowledgment hasn't been received, the backend will throw standard error "Working copy creation is not allowed on Master with id = ". The error is displayed in an overlay. When the error is dismissed, the master is shown with spinner on. One would have to refresh the page to get rid of the spinner.
Carrie- Is the date-tiime displayed in the lock is the date-time WC was merged?
Yes, I would expect that the date/time displayed are at the time the WC commit is sent over to the HW apps; assuming this is coincident or thereabouts with the WC save into master.

During the Demo we have noticed following issues:
# Edit Icon should not display on Published Master
# Message displayed on master while App is waiting for ACK needs modification - need to remover User Name and Date.
# Create WC -> WC icon is appearing on WC itself (page refresh correct it).

note AC that indicates:
edit (pencil) will still display for all users when in this state - so this should stay (there is no harm a Production user can do in the edit properties dialog)

Verified on QAE that WC creation is restricted when Master is waiting for ACK from atleast 1 of provisioned app. Below are the TC's which are run while testing this story:

https://pipeline.cengage.com/confluence/display/NG/NG-10795+Prevent+WC+creation+until+ACK+has+been+received+from+the+homework+apps

Assigning to PO for final validation.

- Vinay

items.fromString: Prevent  Working Copy Save if acknowlegements have not been received by Apps
items.toString: Prevent  Working Copy Save if acknowledgements have not been received by Apps

items.fromString:
h3. as a production, editor or superadmin user, I don't want a snapshot to be created from the Master MT when the Working Copy is being saved because the snapshot could be in a weird state

*Acceptance criteria*
* When a working copy is being saved into the Master, a Fulfillment URL should not create a new snapshot
(?) send a message back (to retry again)- need to work with Kevin T and ask about proper workflow here with CB
* should be same for LMS and CB users

* for apps that rely on the working copy, the working copy should not be saved back to the master if theACKnowledgments have not been received from the Apps
** if number of retries by the App is reached then keep the flag
** a message will be issued to the MT user that acknowledgement was not received by the app and snapshots will not be created until this condition is investigated/resolved.
** if the ACK never comes back from the App, this condition must be resolved manually (the flag to prevent snapshot creation 

*Implementation Considerations*
* set flag to prevent snapshot creation when Save to master is selected
* for MT with no new Apps (or Apps that do not use WC commit events) remove flag when working copy save is finished
* For Apps that do use the WC commit event, lift flag when working copy commit event from app ACK has been received and Save is finished
items.toString:
h3. as a production, editor or superadmin user, I don't want the working copy to be saved back into the Master if all of the acknowledgements have not been received from the app because the shadow course in the Apps could become out of sync

*Acceptance criteria*
* do not allow a W.C. save into the Master when there are pending acknowledgements from an App (WebAssign, CNOW, etc..)
* provide a message to the user that the Working copy is cannot be saved at this time (Message TBD- work with Cindy)- try again message (?) and if this condition persists, log a ticket


** if the ACK never comes back from the App, a Superadmin should be able to override this error and Save the WC to the Master
This issue is introduced by NG-10794

*Acceptance criteria*

* provide a message to the user that the Working copy is cannot be saved at this time (Message TBD- work with Cindy)- try again message (?) and if this condition persists, log a ticket

* in this scenario:
1.	Master Published with no HW Apps
2.	WC created
3.	User provisions HW app to the WC ( APP Provision failed for some reason and the error is returned to the WC) 
4.	User attempts to merge the WC
5. WC save is allowed (the WC was not updated as the app provision failed) 


** if the ACK never comes back from the App, a Superadmin should be able to override this error and Save the WC to the Master

items.toString:
h3. as a production, editor or superadmin user, I don't want snapshots to be created if MindTap has not received an acknowledgement that the working copy commit has been successfully processed.   

Steps to get into this situation: 
1. Create a working copy
2. Make changes
3. Commit working copy to master and send notification to homework app
4. Working Copy successfully committed on MindTap side
5. Notification to homework app doesn't return a success and is in the queue for retry.  
Creating a snapshot while in this state will result in the snapshot being created without the working copy changes in the homework app.  

*Acceptance criteria*
* prevent snapshot creation while working copy commit notification has not received a successful response.  
* similar to NG-10750



** if the ACK never comes back from the App, a Superadmin should be able to override this error and Save the WC to the Master

items.toString:
h3. as a production, editor or superadmin user, I don't want my working copy changes to be saved if the homework app has acknowledged it's ability to commit the working copy changes in their app.  

Steps to get into this situation: 
1. Create a working copy
2. Make changes
3. If changes are made in a homework app, the app is notified via lifecycle events of each change. 
3. Commit working copy to master and send notification to commit working copy changes to homework app
4. MT should wait to receive an acknowledgement from the homework app before proceeding to commit working copy changes on MT side.   
 
Creating a snapshot while in this state will result in the snapshot being created without the working copy changes in the homework app.  

*Acceptance criteria*
* If working copy commit notification to homework app has a status of In Progress, do not commit WC changes on MindTap side. 
* Need to figure out UX or messaging to user if WC commit notification remains in queue for an extended period of time. 
* If user then deletes the working copy, the working copy changes will not be made.  (is there a way to cancel the original notification to homework app?) 



** if the ACK never comes back from the App, a Superadmin should be able to override this error and Save the WC to the Master (this is NG-10751)

* If working copy commit notification to homework app has a status of In Progress, do not commit WC changes on MindTap side. 
* Need to figure out UX or messaging to user if WC commit notification remains in queue for an extended period of time. 
* If user then deletes the working copy, the working copy changes will not be made.  (is there a way to cancel the original notification to homework app?) 



** if the ACK never comes back from the App, a Superadmin should be able to override this error and Save the WC to the Master (this is NG-10751)


10/22/12 notes
-Modify the story to allow the commit to complete but do not allow WC/Snapshot to be created from the Master.
